Home.building-collaborative-wiki-videos: We are building collaborative wiki-based videos in local languages. Join Us.

Header.search_placeholder: Search a topic or Paste a URL
Header.beta_disclaimer_1: VideoWiki is a proof of concept for a tool that allows you to collaboratively create and edit videos by dragging and dropping images and videos from Wikimedia Commons to relevant Wikipedia text.
Header.beta_disclaimer_2: VideoWiki is currently in Beta stage and despite our progress, we have only scratched the surface. We are actively working towards adding many more features and additional functionality. Anyone, including yourself, can edit a VideoWiki article even without logging in. Your user name (if you use one) or IP address will be associated with your edits.
Header.login_success: Awesome! You can now upload files to VideoWiki directly from your computer.
Header.logo_description: The Free Multi-Media Encyclopedia that anyone can edit.

Footer.text_audio_license: Text and audio are available under the <0 href='https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/' target='blank'> Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License 3.0 or later. </0> Images including those within videos are under various Open and Creative Common Licenses.
Footer.software_license: The VideoWiki software is available under the GNU General Public License 3.0 and is on <0 href='https://github.com/videowikips/videowiki' target='blank'>https://github.com/videowikips/videowiki</0>

UploadFileInfoModal.title_description_1: A unique descriptive title for the file which will server as a filename.
UploadFileInfoModal.title_description_2: You may use plain language with spaces. Do not include the file extension
UploadFileInfoModal.description_description:
Please describe the media as much as possible.

Where was it taken?
What does it show?
What is the context?
Please describe the object or persons?
If the media shows something unusual, please explain what makes it unusual

UploadFileInfoModal.save_template_description: By selecting this field, you'll be able to import this form values directly into other forms using the import button above
UploadFileInfoModal.auto_download_label: Auto download the video after it's exported
UploadFileInfoModal.auto_download_description: By selecting this field, the video will downloaded once it's exported
